The Kauffman Fellowship is a two-year educational, networking, and leadership development program for venture capitalists. The program is dedicated to the world of venture capital and the cultivation of new high-technology, high-growth, high-impact companies.

GrowthX Academy is an on-site 12-week intensive program that prepares individuals to transition into an early stage tech company and begin making a positive impact from day one. The curriculum is designed and taught by successful tech industry experts, each with a track record of building high-growth startups. Students learn industry best practices in a highly-interactive classroom environment, and work directly with early-stage growth companies based in Silicon Valley and beyond. Course tracks include Sales and Business Development, Growth Marketing, and UX Design.

We help companies grow through capital, talent, and know how.We're working to spread hope and prosperity through entrepreneurism, innovation and education. Visit growthx.com to learn more about GrowthX Capital, GrowthX Corporate, GrowthX Academy and our Market Acceleration Program (MXP).

Working with Andrew was a breath of fresh air. Andrew brought expert business law know-how to every deal, and importantly, he brought a sharp business acumen and a focus on the business objectives. I could always count on him get deals done, advance our deal structures and protect the long-term interests of the business and company. It was inevitable that Andrew would go on to be an entrepreneur, business operations leader and build and scale market leading businesses.

Andrew was a key stakeholder for me during his time at BrightTALK and I am proud to have been associated with him. His strategic vision around how to scale our audience business stretched way beyond his own team. The influence and support he gave our sales team was invaluable and his willingness to share his vast knowledge and experience of the B2B world helped many individual sellers have smarter conversations with their clients. His depth of reading and passion for start ups meant he was always sharing great content that helped everyones education. HIs commercial vision and support to the sales team has helped me grow the revenues in my business significantly. I look forward to keeping in touch and to continue sharing great ideas and great content with him.

April 7, 2014, John was senior to Andrew but didn’t manage directly

I have worked directly with Andrew since my arrival at BrightTALK eight months ago. As a CFO I have very high expectations on what it means to be a fully-fledged member of a senior management team driving value creation for a business. Andrew was able to use his previous experiences combined with an incredible intellect and passion for learning new business models in order to spotlight those areas that would require investment and drive long-term value for the Company.  During his tenure we enjoyed not only substantial growth in our Audience business but also a shift from one-time events to more SaaS based recurring revenues.  His reach went beyond his own team and he connected with all functional areas in order to fully understand and help craft our Audience value proposition. He is a consummate professional dedicated to making his mark in whatever he pursues and I look forward to our paths crossing again in the future.

In a very short space of time Andrew succeeded in re-defining our view on how to achieve our strategic goal of building a global audience platform for business professionals.  Andrew rapidly identified the gaps in our thinking and execution, devised a comprehensive technology roadmap and highlighted the costs that would be involved in achieving all of our goals.  He also strengthened the team globally, improved our operational processes and helped us to achieve record revenues while transforming to a subscription business model.  Unfortunately the timeframes involved in building the technology created a period of time which doesn't require someone of Andrew's experience and senior execution capabilities and we felt the best course of action would be stay in touch while we focus on technology development.  Andrew is a true professional who brings energy and thoughtfulness to any business situation.  He is a leader capable of motivating a team and setting course for an exiting future.  His experience in professional communities is deep and I look forward to him continuing to shape our thinking as a friend of BrightTALK going forward.

Andrew helped us get our legal 'house' in order at GuideSpark.  From our contract management processes to overhauling and simplifying our master agreement, to helping us frame and negotiate some very important deals, Andrew has had a significant and positive impact on GuideSpark.  Andrew has a great blend of business and legal acumen which help him look at a deal from all angles - he knows how to mitigate risk while still being 'deal-oriented' and customer-centric.  Andrew has my strong endorsement and I hope we'll have the opportunity to work together in the future.

Andrew is our Super Mentor at Matter, our start-up accelerator for media entrepreneurs.  The combination of his ability to first listen to entrepreneurs and understand their vision, strengths, and weaknesses and then to analyze their venture, brainstorm new directions, and connect them to the right people and opportunities is powerful and has positively impacted the direction of many of our companies.  Above all, he is dedicated, generous, and has an enthusiasm that is infectious.  I am grateful to have him as a member of the extended Matter Ventures team.

I have had the pleasure of knowing Brad personally and professionally since 1999. Simply put, Brad is a pleasure to be around. He shows grace under pressure and brings an energy to every situation that is fun, thoughtful, helpful, and steady. He is a top business development professional. For these reasons, my partners and I invited Brad to join GrowthX as a full Partner and, recently, as a Managing Member of our Fund Management Company.Brad has quickly developed his sense for potential investment opportunities, and his methodical and thorough approach to due diligence has helped the Fund make important decisions. Brad's character, likeability and reliability has helped him build and maintain a diverse network not only in Nashville, but throughout Tennessee and across the Southeast Region of the United States.Brad embodies each of the eight Core Values that GrowthX was founded upon. I'm proud and grateful for his friendship and his partnership.

Ian is a rare breed of young professional.  He has highly capable technical skills earned and honed through heads-down hard work and serious instruction; he has strong intuitive business acumen; and his intelligence and work ethic is further complimented by a genuine and infectious enthusiasm and a warm and friendly personality that attracts others and makes him a natural leader.Ian is equally comfortable and capable taking on creative, technical and commercial challenges.  As his direct line manager, I have seen him take on all three simultaneously and deliver a scalable solution, on time and within budget, and all while exhibiting grace under pressure.Ian focused on moving our user growth and engagement up and to the right.  He epitomizes the term "hacker" in that he thinks outside the box, knows when to disregard the "rules" (i..e, "but we've always done it that way."), and is quick to uncover new ways to solve problems and craft solutions.  Ian is equal parts creative and analytical.A few example of Ian's work while I managed him:- Designing paid acquisition campaigns - identifying the right partners, building and executing the campaigns methodically, and continuously analyzing results and iterating towards optimization.- Building, executing and optimizing all aspects of email marketing campaigns.- Landing page design and optimization.- Data analytics and A/B testing for user acquisition and engagement- Scoping and illustrating the entire user journey, with a focus on the user on-boarding process to improve our conversion funnels.More important than his technical skills, though, is Ian's attitude.  He is equally at ease with peers and superiors, with finance and sales professionals, administrative staff and developers.  Ian shares the one trait that I've seen consistently exhibited among successful people across all professions - a strong orientation to stay calm and carry on.I highly recommend Ian and look forward to working with him again one day.

Endorsed by 4 of Andrew’s colleagues at GrowthX
summary: I co-founded GrowthX where I serve as Managing Member. I help build deal flow and make investment decisions, lead LP and portfolio relations, help run the Academy, attract and serve Corporate clients, and craft and guide the overall vision keeping everyone pointed towards a common North Star and keep the wheels on the bus.Prior to GrowthX, I was a technology attorney at a law firm and as corporate counsel, serving many of the early Internet pioneers. I moved out of a purely legal role and into operations and leadership roles at a large multinational where I helped conceive, build and scale an international media business in the U.S., Europe, and Asia Pacific. I’ve been fortunate to live and work in New York, Hong Kong, Singapore and San Francisco where I've had the opportunity to manage, mentor and advise diverse people from dozens of countries.Select Professional Highlights Before GrowthX:- Transformed underperforming business unit by launching subscription-based business yielding highest bookings and revenue months and quarters in company's history. (BrightTALK, as VP/GM)- Led market development and launched a subscriptions-based media business in APAC and UAE, regularly exceeding top-line growth targets. (Thomson Reuters, as MD/GM)- Implemented and ran commercial strategy and market development in Asia and the Americas for Reuters News with 3,000 journalists globally in over 100 countries producing over 250,000 pieces of content every year. (Thomson Reuters, as Publisher, Reuters News)- Co-founded and led global commercial strategy, market development and business operations for media business leading up to the $17B acquisition of Reuters. (Thomson Financial, as VP, Strategy and Operations)- Led commercial transactions (Internet, e-commerce, emerging media, FinTech) and developed agile and practical legal processes, as outside and in-house legal counsel. (GuideSpark, DoubleClick, Salesforce, Yahoo!, Thomson Corporation, Skadden Arps)
name: Andrew Goldner
title: Co-Founder at GrowthX
